meanings.sent1: The bicaudal lizard scurried across the sand.
meanings.sent2: The bicaudal fish gracefully swam in the aquarium.
meanings.sent3: The bicaudal cat chased its two tails in circles.
meanings.sent4: The bicaudal kite soared high with its two tails fluttering in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The bicaudal bird perched on the branch, showing off its unique feature.

meanings.sent1: The bicaudal rope had a knot at each end.
meanings.sent2: The bicaudal bridge spanned the river with two sturdy pillars.
meanings.sent3: The bicaudal ruler had markings on both ends for measuring.
meanings.sent4: The bicaudal road led to two different destinations.
meanings.sent5: The bicaudal scarf kept both ends of the neck warm in the cold weather.
